001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import java.util.Formatter;
004
005/**
006 * Hex string to hex conversion utility class.
007 */
008public class HexUtil {
009    /**
010     * Converts a hex-encoded string into a byte array.
011     * If you are on Java 17 or later you should use {@code HexFormat}
012     *
013     * @param s A string to convert
014     * @return The byte array
015     */
016    public static byte[] hexStringToByteArray(String s) {
017        int len = s.length();
018        byte[] data = new byte[len / 2];
019        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 2) {
020            data[i / 2] = (byte) ((Character.digit(s.charAt(i), 16) << 4)
021                    + Character.digit(s.charAt(i + 1), 16));
022        }
023        return data;
024    }
025
026    // From: http://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/questions/8475/how-to-get-hex-string-from-transaction-in-bitcoinj
027    public static String bytesToHexString(byte[] bytes) {
028        final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
029        Formatter formatter = new Formatter(sb);
030        for (byte b : bytes) {
031            formatter.format("%02x", b);
032        }
033        formatter.close();
034        return sb.toString();
035    }
036}
